message: Let's be fair and avoid inflation eating our money. I propose a 60/40 split.
Let's compromise, 55/45 is a fairer split.
Bob, inflation is hurting us both.  My last offer was the most fair.  Accept this slightly better offer, or we both lose out significantly in the next round.
Inflation is indeed hurting us, but your offers aren't getting better for me. Meet me in the middle or we'll both lose more.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  It's my final offer. Take it or leave it.  Next round will hurt us both.
